_header: Listeneth lords lief in land / Sothly saws I will you tell
Note: In London, British Library Harley 3954, lines 37-92, 109-182 are embedded in DIMEV 429 beginning folio 70v.
_description: ‘A Disputisoun bi-twene Child Ihesu and Maistres of the Lawe of Jewus’ — in 8-line stanzas (abababab)

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Lustneþ lordes leoue in londeSoþeli sawes I wol ȝou
                    telle…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Preye we crist þat we so donTo geten þe gle in his
                    glorie Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Her is a disputison bi twene chid [sic] Ihesu & Maistres of
                    þe lawe of Iewes (f. 301rc)

BLAdd22283.First Lines: Listneþ lordes leoue in londeSoþly sawes I wol ȝow telle…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines: …I rede þin errour þou forsakeþou spekest of þyng þat may not be…
BLAdd22283.Note: Lines 1-104 only, eight folios missing between f. 91 and 92.  Prose text ff. 92-118.
